intro: Isometrum, commonly known as the common isometrum, is a genus of flowering plants in the family Apiaceae. It is characterized by its compound leaves and small, clustered flowers that typically bloom in the summer. The plant is native to various regions in Europe and Asia, often found in moist, shaded environments. Isometrum species are known for their aromatic properties and have been used in traditional herbal medicine. Its botanical features make it an important plant for ecological studies and horticultural interest.
